data: {"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3306467,"name":"5549","username":"GryphonRobotics","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/gryphonrobotics/{size}/175238_2.png","created_at":"2024-02-10T19:00:55.234Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eHello, we have recently switched to using Choreo instead of PathPlanner for our autonomous trajectories. A few weeks ago we tested basic paths and they were running fine. This week however, when we tested our rotation and movement in the x and y directions independently, the robot didn’t rotate enough (it rotated about 5/6 of any given angle). Additionally, while the robot mostly moved correctly for the x and y directions, it was also not moving enough and sometimes did not run straight, not exhibiting a clear pattern. We are unsure of what changed between the 2 times we have tested Choreo.\u003c/p\u003e","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":3,"updated_at":"2024-02-10T19:00:55.234Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":131,"reads":60,"readers_count":59,"score":682.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":454214,"topic_slug":"choreo-autonomous-paths-not-executing-correctly","display_username":"5549","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":54046,"hidden":false,"trust_level":1,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/choreo-autonomous-paths-not-executing-correctly/454214/1","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3306473,"name":"Lyssia","username":"apotato","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/apotato/{size}/204534_2.png","created_at":"2024-02-10T19:06:16.732Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003ehave there been any hardware or software changes since you last ran choreo?
